arxiv_id.description: If the submission has been published, this is the associated arXiv ID

owner.description: The user or client responsible for the submission. May be transferred to another user or client by the current owner.

creator.description: The user responsible for creating the submission. Read-only.

proxy.description: The client or user who registered the submission on behalf of the creator. Read-only.

submitter_is_author.description: Indicates whether or not the submitter is also an author of the resource.

submitter_accepts_policy.description: Indicates whether or not the submitter accepts the arXiv submission

submitter_contact_verified.description: Indicates that the submitter has verified their contact information.

created.description: Timestamp for when the submission was created

updated.description: Timestamp for when the submission was last updated

client.description: The client used by the user or proxy to create the submission

license.description: License to be applied to the submission.

secondary_classification.description: The archive(s) and subject class(es) for this submission.

finalized.description: Indicates whether or not the submission is ready for publication (pending moderation).

active.description: Indicates whether or not the submission is under active processing. Submissions that are deleted, withdrawn, or published are considered inactive.

published.description: Indicates whether or not the submission is published.

events.description: Submission events related to the submission.

compiled_content.description: Compiled representations of the submission content, e.g. PDF, DVI, PS, HTML

source_content.description: Information about the submission source content package.
